sect2.para: This package does not come with a test suite.

sect2.title: Command Explanations
sect2.para: --libexecdir=$GNOME_PREFIX/lib: This parameter causes the libexec files to be installed in the preferred location of $GNOME_PREFIX/lib/evolution instead of $GNOME_PREFIX/libexec/evolution.
--enable-nss: This parameter is used to pull in the Mozilla Network Security Services libraries for SSL support.
--enable-smime: This parameter is used to pull in the Mozilla Network Security Services libraries for S/MIME support.
--disable-image-inline: This parameter is used to disable the image-inline plugin.
--disable-pst-import: This parameter is used to disable the pst-import plugin.
--disable-nm: This parameter is used to disable NetworkManager support. Use it if you have not installed NetworkManager.
--with-openldap: This parameter will compile LDAP support into Evolution.
--with-krb5=/usr: This parameter will compile Kerberos5 support into Evolution.
